short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the Speed of GPT Anywhere Online: Experience the quickest and most efficient way to harness the power of GPT across the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AskGPT - Your AI-Powered Assistant for the Web
Are you ready to supercharge your online experience with the magic of AI ?  Meet AskGPT, your trusty AI companion that brings the power of OpenAI's GPT models to your fingertips, wherever you are on the web.

What is AskGPT ?
AskGPT is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance your web browsing experience. It seamlessly integrates with popular websites like Twitter, Gmail, YouTube, Instagram, and more, giving you the ability to interact with AI in real-time. Whether you're looking for quick answers, content suggestions, or creative inspiration, AskGPT has you covered.

Key Features:
1. Convenient Text Analysis
Use AskGPT to analyze and respond to text you've written in a textbox on any webpage.
Simply type your query or prompt into any text box on websites like Twitter, Gmail, YouTube, Instagram, and more.
Get instant AI-powered insights to enhance your content or streamline your workflow.

2. Simple Usage
Write your text and then highlight the portion you want analyzed.
Right-click on the highlighted text and choose 'AskGPT' from the context menu.
Receive immediate responses from AskGPT directly in the same textbox.

3. In-Place Responses
Get immediate AI-powered insights as the response from AskGPT is returned directly into the same textbox, enhancing your workflow with seamless integration.

How Does It Work ?
AskGPT leverages the incredible capabilities of OpenAI's GPT models to provide you with accurate, context-aware responses. Whether you need help drafting an email, generating content, or even brainstorming ideas, AskGPT is your go-to AI co-pilot.

Privacy-Friendly
We value your privacy. AskGPT operates as a fully private extension, ensuring that your interactions with AI remain confidential and secure. Data is yours, and we're committed to keeping it that way.

Join the AI Revolution
Embrace the future of online interaction with AskGPT. Experience the incredible potential of AI-driven content creation and text analysis right from your web browser.

Ready to Get Started ?
Unlock the power of GPT models with AskGPT. Download the extension now and discover a new world of possibilities for your online activities.
Made with ❤️ by DSOS.
